## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**AI Assistant:**
Hey there! I'm here to assist you in understanding Verus. What's on your mind today?

**User:**
I've been looking into Verus Vault, and I was wondering, what are some of the additional use cases for Verus Vault, beyond protection from private key theft?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus Vault provides security and decentralized recovery for IDs and NFTs, as well as time locks for other purposes, such as vesting schedules, trusts, and inheritance. This provides a comprehensive solution for protecting and preserving blockchain assets and generational wealth.

**User:**
That's really interesting. What are the requirements for enabling Verus Vault capabilities, such as revocation, recovery, and lock protection?

**AI Assistant:**
To enable Verus Vault capabilities, you need to have at least one primary identity and at least one revocation and recovery ID configured.

**User:**
I see. How does Verus Vault protect against unauthorized access to locked funds, and what is the role of the revocation and recovery authority identities?

**AI Assistant:**
A locked VerusID can always be revoked and recovered by its revocation and recovery authority identities, which circumvents the lock. This allows the authority identities to recover the funds in case of unauthorized access. Additionally, anyone with only the primary keys, including a multisig of primary keys, must first unlock the ID and then wait for the predetermined unlock time before they can spend or access the funds. This provides an extra layer of protection against unauthorized access.

**User:**
That makes sense. I also saw something about a Verus ID and NFT Marketplace. What is that, and what benefits does it offer?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on-chain. This platform provides several benefits, including decentralized transactions, transparent and private transactions, and flexibility. Owners can select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in the digital ownership economy.

**User:**
I think I understand. But just to clarify, what is Verus Vault, and how does it protect funds on a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus Vault is a feature that allows users to protect funds on a VerusID, even in the event of private key theft. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, the funds cannot be spent until it is unlocked again. While locked, the funds can still be staked on the Verus network to earn rewards, and the ID can still receive funds.

What are some of the additional use cases for Verus Vault, beyond protection from private key theft?

Verus Vault provides security and decentralized recovery for IDs and NFTs, as well as time locks for other purposes, such as:

* Vesting schedules
* Trusts
* Inheritance

This provides a comprehensive solution for protecting and preserving blockchain assets and generational wealth.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.A locked VerusID can always be revoked and recovered by its revocation and recovery authority identities, which circumvents the lock. At the same time, anyone with only the primary keys, even a multisig of primary keys must first unlock, then wait for the predetermined unlock time before they can spend or access funds. This gives you, or maybe a company that specializes in watching the blockchain to whom you've assigned the revocation ID to revoke and recover whenever an unauthorized unlock occurs. That means that like a bank, setting a 24 hour unlock delay on your locked IDs actually provides the first decentralized solution to the infamous 5 dollar wrench attack.In addition to a new level of blockchain protection and decentralized funds recovery, Verus Vault provides the same security for your IDs and NFTs as well as time locks for other purposes, such as vesting schedules, trusts, and inheritance. With Verus Vault, you can now protect and recover your funds, preserving all your assets and generational blockchain wealth from common forms of crypto loss or theft, no bank required.

What is the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and what benefits does it offer?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on-chain. This platform provides several benefits, including:

* Decentralized transactions: All transactions are executed directly between peers, without the need for intermediaries.
* Transparent and private transactions: Users can pay or offer to pay from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, which are still auditable by them.
* Flexibility: Owners can select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in the digital ownership economy.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. At the same time, anyone with only the primary keys, even a multisig of primary keys must first unlock, then wait for the predetermined unlock time before they can spend or access funds. This gives you, or maybe a company that specializes in watching the blockchain to whom you've assigned the revocation ID to revoke and recover whenever an unauthorized unlock occurs. That means that like a bank, setting a 24 hour unlock delay on your locked IDs actually provides the first decentralized solution to the infamous 5 dollar wrench attack.In addition to a new level of blockchain protection and decentralized funds recovery, Verus Vault provides the same security for your IDs and NFTs as well as time locks for other purposes, such as vesting schedules, trusts, and inheritance. With Verus Vault, you can now protect and recover your funds, preserving all your assets and generational blockchain wealth from common forms of crypto loss or theft, no bank required.
